City Hall

Clarksville City Hall is located at: 800 West Main Street Clarksville, TX 75426 8 to 5 Monday through Friday

903-427-3834 City Hall (Water or Court) 903-427-3907 Fax City Hall 903-427-3834 Police Department

Ann Rushing, Mayor (citymayor@suddenlinkmail.com)

City Manager, (citymanager@suddenlinkmail.com)

Marisa Webster, City Secretary, (citysecretary@clarksvilletx.com)

Tommy Hunt, Chief of Police

(Ashley Bray, Code Compliance, (clarksvillece@suddenlinkmail.com

Alex Davidson, Judge (court@suddenlinkmail.com)

Messer, Fort and McDonald, City Attorney

The City of Clarksville is giving notice of the City’s intent to submit a Texas Community Development Block Grant Program grant application for a Community Development Fund grant request of $350,000 for reconstruction and drainage improvements for portions of North Pecan Street and South Delaware Street in the City of Clarksville. The application is available for review at Clarksville City Hall during regular business hours. Para obtener una copia en español, comuníquese con la secretaria de la ciudad al 903-427-3834.

The City of Clarksville has instituted a mass communication system to send emergency alerts and other important news and notifications. Subscribers can register to receive alerts via phone call, text message, and/or email by signing up here
